articles.title: Asian markets tumble as Trump's tariff war escalates - BBC.com
articles.description: Investors are bracing for a potential trade war that could hit the earnings of major companies.
articles.content:
Asian shares slid on Monday morning after US President Donald Trump followed through on his promise to impose tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China.
